snippet: Mr. Miller’s over-the-top glamour for the “Dynasty” TV series, which influenced a decade of power dressing, included sequined gowns, luncheon suits and the occasional turban.
abstract: Nolan Miller, fashion designer who created the looks on the television series Dynasty, dies at age 79.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Miller’s over-the-top glamour for the “Dynasty” TV series, which influenced a decade of power dressing, included sequined gowns, luncheon suits and the occasional turban.

headline.seo: Nolan Miller, Designer of ‘Dynasty’ Looks, Dies at 79
headline.main: Nolan Miller, Designer of ‘Dynasty’ Power Looks, Is Dead at 79
headline.print_headline: Nolan Miller, 79, Designer Of ‘Dynasty’ Power Looks
